00039 void
00040 GenericInterfaceVcs::setup (uint v, uint cr)
00041 {
00042     vcs =v;
00043     credits = cr;
00044     /* All this is part of the init */
00045     address = myId();
00046     flast_vc = 0;
00047 //    convert_packet_cycles = DEFAULT_CONVERT_PACKET_CYCLES;
00048 
00049     in_buffer.resize(vcs, buffer_size);
00050     out_buffer.resize(vcs, buffer_size);
00051     downstream_credits.resize(vcs);
00052 
00053     out_packet_flit_index.resize(vcs);
00054     in_ready.resize(vcs);
00055     in_packets_flit_index.resize(vcs);
00056     in_packet_complete.resize(vcs);
00057 
00058     in_packets.resize(vcs);
00059     in_packets_valid.resize(vcs);
00060     out_packets.resize(vcs);
00061     out_arbiter.set_no_requestors(vcs);
00062 
00063 
00064     for ( uint i=0; i<vcs ; i++ )
00065     {
00066         out_packet_flit_index[i] = 0;
00067         in_ready[i] = true;
00068         in_packet_complete[i] = false;
00069         in_packets[i].destination = address;
00070         in_packets[i].virtual_channel = i;
00071         in_packets[i].length= 10;
00072         downstream_credits[i] = credits;
00073     }
00074 
00075     /*  init stats */
00076     packets_out = 0;
00077     flits_out = 0;
00078     packets_in = 0;
00079     flits_in = 0;
00080     total_packets_in_time = 0;
00081 
00082     ticking = false;
00083     /* Init complete */
00084 
00085     /* Send a ready event for each vc 
00086        for ( uint i=0 ; i<vcs ; i++ )
00087        {
00088        IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00089        in_packets[i].virtual_channel = i;
00090        VirtualChannelDescription* vc = new VirtualChannelDescription();
00091        vc->vc = i;
00092        event->event_data.push_back(vc);
00093        event->type = READY_EVENT;
00094        event->vc = i;
00095        Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now(),&NetworkComponent::process_event, processor_connection, event); 
00096        }
00097      */
00098 
00099     return;
00100 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterfaceVcs::setup  ----- */

00136 void
00137 GenericInterfaceVcs::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00138 {
00139     switch(e->type)
00140     {
00143         case READY_EVENT:
00144             handle_ready_event(e);
00145             break;
00146 
00149         case LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT:
00150             handle_link_arrival(e);
00151             break;
00152 
00155         case NEW_PACKET_EVENT:
00156             handle_new_packet_event(e);
00157             break;
00158 
00166         case TICK_EVENT:
00167             handle_tick_event(e);
00168             break;
00169 
00170         default:
00171             cout << "**Unkown event exception! " << e->type << endl;
00172             break;
00173     }
00174 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterfaceVcs::process_event ----- */
00175 
00176 void
00177 GenericInterfaceVcs::handle_ready_event( IrisEvent* e)
00178 {
00182 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00183 if(is_mc_interface)
00184 {
00185     _DBG(" IntM got ready from NI %d ", e->vc);
00186 }
00187 else
00188 {
00189     _DBG(" Int got ready %d ", e->vc);
00190 }
00191 #endif
00192 
00193 if( in_ready[e->vc] )
00194 {
00195     cout << " Error Recv incorrect READY !" << endl;
00196     exit(1);
00197 }
00198     in_ready[e->vc] = true;
00199     if(!ticking)
00200     { 
00201         ticking = true;
00202         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00203         event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00204         event->vc = e->vc;
00205         Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00206     }
00207 
00208     delete e;
00209     return;
00210 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterfaceVcs::handle_ready_event  ----- */
00211 
00212 void
00213 GenericInterfaceVcs::handle_link_arrival ( IrisEvent* e)
00214 {
00224     LinkArrivalData* uptr = static_cast<LinkArrivalData* >(e->event_data.at(0));
00225 
00226     if(uptr->type == FLIT_ID)
00227     {
00228         flits_in++;
00229         in_buffer.change_push_channel(uptr->vc);
00230         in_buffer.push(uptr->ptr);
00231         if( uptr->ptr->type == TAIL )
00232         {
00233             packets_in++;
00234             total_packets_in_time += (Simulator::Now() - static_cast<TailFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->packet_originated_time);
00235             static_cast<TailFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->avg_network_latency = ceil(Simulator::Now());
00236         }
00237 
00238 #ifdef _DEBUG
00239         if( uptr->ptr->type == HEAD)
00240         {
00241             HeadFlit* hf = static_cast<HeadFlit*>(uptr->ptr);
00242             if( is_mc_interface)
00243             {
00244                 _DBG(" ROUTER->MINT vc%d %llx",uptr->vc,hf->addr);
00245             }
00246             else
00247             {
00248                 _DBG(" ROUTER->INT vc%d %llx",uptr->vc,hf->addr);
00249             }
00250         }
00251 #endif
00252 
00253         if( uptr->ptr->type == HEAD && static_cast<HeadFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->msg_class == ONE_FLIT_REQ )
00254         {
00255             packets_in++;
00256             total_packets_in_time += (Simulator::Now() - static_cast<HeadFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->packet_originated_time);
00257             static_cast<HeadFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->avg_network_latency = ceil(Simulator::Now())
00258                 -static_cast<HeadFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->avg_network_latency;
00259         }
00260         uptr->valid = false;
00261 
00262         if( !(uptr->ptr->type == TAIL || 
00263               ( uptr->ptr->type == HEAD && static_cast<HeadFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->msg_class == ONE_FLIT_REQ )))
00264         {
00265             LinkArrivalData* arrival = new LinkArrivalData();
00266             arrival->vc = uptr->ptr->vc;
00267             arrival->type = CREDIT_ID;
00268             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00269             event->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00270             event->vc = uptr->ptr->vc;
00271             event->event_data.push_back(arrival);
00272             event->src_id = address;
00273             if(do_two_stage_router)
00274                 Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+0.75, 
00275                                      &NetworkComponent::process_event, 
00276                                      static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connection)->input_connection, event);
00277             else
00278                 Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1.75, 
00279                                      &NetworkComponent::process_event, 
00280                                      static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connection)->input_connection, event);
00281 
00282         }
00283     }
00284     else if ( uptr->type == CREDIT_ID)
00285     {
00286         downstream_credits[uptr->vc]++;
00287     }
00288     else
00289     {
00290         cout << "Exception: Unk link arrival data type! " << endl;
00291     }
00292 
00293     if(!ticking)
00294     {
00295         ticking = true;
00296         IrisEvent* new_event = new IrisEvent();
00297         new_event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00298         new_event->vc = e->vc;
00299         Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &GenericInterfaceVcs::process_event, this, new_event);
00300     }
00301     delete uptr;
00302     delete e;
00303     return;
00304 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterfaceVcs::handle_link_arrival  ----- */

00306 void
00307 GenericInterfaceVcs::handle_new_packet_event(IrisEvent* e)
00308 {
00309     HighLevelPacket* pkt = static_cast<HighLevelPacket*>(e->event_data.at(0));
00310     /* 
00311     if( pkt->msg_class == RESPONSE_PKT)
00312         pkt->virtual_channel = 1;
00313     else
00314         pkt->virtual_channel = 0;
00315      * */
00316 
00317     pkt->to_low_level_packet(&out_packets[pkt->virtual_channel]);
00318 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00319     if(is_mc_interface)
00320     {
00321         _DBG(" IntM NI->MInt ch%d %llx", pkt->virtual_channel,pkt->addr);
00322     }
00323     else
00324     {
00325         _DBG(" Int Proc->Int ch%d %llx", pkt->virtual_channel,pkt->addr);
00326     }
00327 #endif
00328 
00329     out_packet_flit_index[ pkt->virtual_channel ] = 0;
00330     delete pkt;
00331 
00332     if( !ticking)
00333     {
00334         ticking = true;
00335         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00336         event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00337         event->vc = e->vc;
00338         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00339     }
00340 
00341     delete e;
00342     return;
00343 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterfaceVcs::handle_new_packet_event  ----- */
00344 
00345 void
00346 GenericInterfaceVcs::handle_tick_event(IrisEvent* e)
00347 {
00348     ticking = false;
00349 
00350     /*---------- This is on the output side. From processor out to network --------- */
00351     if ( !out_arbiter.is_empty())
00352     {
00353         uint winner = out_arbiter.pick_winner();
00354         if ( winner > vcs )
00355         {
00356             cout << " ERROR: Interface Arbiter picked incorrect vc to send " << endl;
00357             exit(1);
00358         }
00359         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00360         LinkArrivalData* arrival =  new LinkArrivalData();
00361         arrival->type = FLIT_ID;
00362         arrival->vc = out_packets[winner].virtual_channel;
00363         event->vc = arrival->vc;
00364         out_buffer.change_pull_channel(arrival->vc);
00365         arrival->ptr = out_buffer.pull();
00366         arrival->ptr->vc = arrival->vc;
00367         downstream_credits[arrival->vc]--; 
00368         flits_out++;
00369 
00370         event->event_data.push_back(arrival);
00371         event->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00372         event->src_id = address;
00373         event->vc = arrival->vc;
00374 
00375         Flit* f = arrival->ptr;
00376 
00377         if(do_two_stage_router)
00378             Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+0.75, 
00379                                 &NetworkComponent::process_event, 
00380                                 static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connection)->output_connection, event);
00381         else
00382             Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1.75, 
00383                                 &NetworkComponent::process_event, 
00384                                 static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connection)->output_connection, event);
00385         static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connection)->flits_passed++;
00386         ticking = true;
00387         if ( f->type == HEAD )
00388         {
00389             HeadFlit* hf = static_cast<HeadFlit*>(f);
00390 
00391 #ifdef _DEBUG
00392             if(is_mc_interface)
00393             {
00394                 _DBG("INTM->ROUTER vc:%d %llx",arrival->vc,hf->addr);
00395             }
00396             else
00397             {
00398                 _DBG("INT->ROUTER vc:%d %llx",arrival->vc, hf->addr);
00399             }
00400 #endif
00401 
00402         static_cast<HeadFlit*>(f)->avg_network_latency = Simulator::Now() 
00403             - static_cast<HeadFlit*>(f)->avg_network_latency;
00404         }
00405 
00406         if (f->type == TAIL || ( f->type == HEAD && static_cast<HeadFlit*>(f)->msg_class == ONE_FLIT_REQ) )
00407         {
00408             packets_out++;
00409             in_packet_complete[winner] = false;
00410 
00411 //            _DBG(" Sending READY to NI pkt_vc:%d ready_vc:%d ad:%llx", f->vc, out_packets[winner].virtual_channel, out_packets[winner].addr);
00412             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00413             event->type = READY_EVENT;
00414             event->vc = winner;
00415             Simulator::Schedule(floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, processor_connection, event);
00416         }
00417         out_arbiter.clear_winner();
00418 
00419     }
00420 
00421     //out packet to out buffer
00422     for ( uint i=0; i<vcs ; i++)
00423         if ( out_packets[i].size() > 0 && out_packet_flit_index[i] < out_packets[i].length )
00424         {
00425             out_buffer.change_push_channel(out_packets[i].virtual_channel);
00426             Flit* ptr = out_packets[i].get_next_flit();
00427             ptr->vc = out_packets[i].virtual_channel;
00428             out_buffer.push( ptr);
00429             out_packet_flit_index[i]++;
00430 
00431             if(out_packet_flit_index[i] == out_packets[i].length )
00432             {
00433                 out_packet_flit_index[i] = 0;
00434                 out_packets[i].flits.clear();
00435                 in_packet_complete[i] = true;
00436             }
00437             ticking = true;
00438         }
00439 
00440     /* Request out arbiter if there are enough credits */
00441     for ( uint i=0; i<vcs ; i++)
00442     {
00443         if( downstream_credits[i]>0 && out_buffer.get_occupancy(i)>0
00444             && in_packet_complete[i] )
00445         {
00446             out_buffer.change_pull_channel(i);
00447             Flit* f= out_buffer.peek();
00448             if((f->type != HEAD)||( f->type == HEAD  && downstream_credits[i] == credits))
00449             {
00450                 if ( !out_arbiter.is_requested(i) )
00451                     out_arbiter.request(i);
00452 
00453                 ticking = true;
00454             }
00455 
00456         }
00457     }
00458 
00459 
00460     /*---------- This is on the input side. From network in to the processor node --------- */
00461     // in packets to processor
00462     bool found = false;
00463     for ( uint i=flast_vc+1; i<vcs ; i++)
00464         if ( in_ready[i] )  
00465         {
00466             flast_vc = i;
00467             found = true;
00468             break;
00469         }
00470 
00471     if(!found)
00472     {    for ( uint i=0; i<=flast_vc ; i++)
00473             if ( in_ready[i] )  
00474             {
00475                 flast_vc = i;
00476                 found = true;
00477                 break;
00478             }
00479     }
00480 
00481     bool pkt_fnd = false;
00482     uint comp_pkt_index = -1;
00483     for ( uint i=0; i<vcs ; i++)
00484         if ( in_packets_flit_index[i]!=0 && in_packets_flit_index[i] == in_packets[i].length)
00485         {
00486             pkt_fnd = true;
00487             comp_pkt_index = i;
00488 //            break;
00489         }
00490 
00491 
00492     if ( found && pkt_fnd )
00493     {
00494         if(!static_cast<Processor*>(processor_connection)->ni_recv)
00495         {
00496             static_cast<Processor*>(processor_connection)->ni_recv = true;
00497             in_ready[flast_vc] = false; 
00498             HighLevelPacket* pkt = new HighLevelPacket();
00499             pkt->from_low_level_packet(&in_packets[comp_pkt_index]);
00500             uint orig_vc = pkt->virtual_channel;
00501             pkt->virtual_channel = flast_vc;
00502             in_packets[comp_pkt_index].virtual_channel = flast_vc;
00503             pkt->recv_time = Simulator::Now();
00504 
00505             /* This should be done inside from_low_level_packet. FIXME */
00506             pkt->avg_network_latency = in_packets[comp_pkt_index].avg_network_latency;
00507             pkt->hop_count = in_packets[comp_pkt_index].hop_count;
00508             pkt->req_start_time = in_packets[comp_pkt_index].req_start_time;
00509             pkt->waiting_in_ni = in_packets[comp_pkt_index].waiting_in_ni;
00510 
00511 #ifdef _DEBUG
00512             if(is_mc_interface)
00513             {
00514                 _DBG(" PKT->NI %llx vc%d",pkt->addr, pkt->virtual_channel);
00515             }
00516             else
00517             {
00518                 _DBG(" PKT->PROC vc%d",pkt->virtual_channel);
00519             }
00520 #endif
00521 
00522             in_packets_flit_index[comp_pkt_index] = 0;
00523             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00524             event->type = NEW_PACKET_EVENT;
00525             event->event_data.push_back(pkt);
00526             event->src_id = address;
00527             event->vc = pkt->virtual_channel;
00528             Simulator::Schedule(floor(Simulator::Now())+ 1, 
00529                                 &NetworkComponent::process_event, processor_connection, event);
00530 
00531             LinkArrivalData* arrival = new LinkArrivalData();
00532             arrival->vc = orig_vc; //pkt->virtual_channel;
00533             arrival->type = CREDIT_ID;
00534             IrisEvent* event2 = new IrisEvent();
00535             event2->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00536             event2->vc = orig_vc; //pkt->virtual_channel;
00537             event2->event_data.push_back(arrival);
00538             event2->src_id = address;
00539             if(do_two_stage_router)
00540                 Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+0.75, 
00541                                      &NetworkComponent::process_event, 
00542                                      static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connection)->input_connection, event2);
00543             else
00544                 Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1.75, 
00545                                      &NetworkComponent::process_event, 
00546                                      static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connection)->input_connection, event2);
00547             ticking = true;
00548 
00549         }
00550         else
00551             ticking =true;
00552     }
00553 
00554     // arbitrate for the winner and push packets to in_buffer
00555     for ( uint i=0; i<vcs ; i++ )
00556         if( in_buffer.get_occupancy(i) > 0 && in_packets_flit_index[i] < in_packets[i].length )
00557         {
00558             in_buffer.change_pull_channel(i);
00559             Flit* ptr = in_buffer.pull();
00560             in_packets[i].add(ptr);
00561 
00562             in_packets_flit_index[i]++;
00563             ticking = true;
00564 
00565             if( ptr->type == HEAD && static_cast<HeadFlit*>(ptr)->dst_address != node_ip)
00566             {
00567                 _DBG("ERROR IncorrectDestinationException pkt_dest: %d node_ip: %d", in_packets[i].destination, node_ip); 
00568             }
00569 
00570         }
00571 
00572     if(ticking)
00573     {
00574         ticking = true;
00575         IrisEvent* new_event = new IrisEvent();
00576         new_event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00577         new_event->vc = e->vc;
00578         Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &GenericInterfaceVcs::process_event, this, new_event);
00579     }
00580 
00581     delete e;
00582 }

00584 
00585 string
00586 GenericInterfaceVcs::print_stats()
00587 {
00588     stringstream str;
00589     str << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] flits_in: " << flits_in
00590         << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] packets_in: " << packets_in
00591         << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] flits_out: " << flits_out
00592         << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] packets_out: " << packets_out
00593         << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] total_packet_latency(In packets): " << total_packets_in_time;
00594     if(packets_in != 0)
00595         str << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] avg_packet_latency(In packets): " << (total_packets_in_time+0.0)/packets_in
00596                                                                                      ;
00597     return str.str();
00598 
00599 }

00601 ullint
00602 GenericInterfaceVcs::get_flits_out()

00604     return flits_out;

00608 GenericInterfaceVcs::get_packets_out()

00613 ullint
00614 GenericInterfaceVcs::get_packets()
